TopicTitle: Why Toad doesn't fly rockets, A KSP fail montage

Articles.Content:
Me and my friend think Toad, from Mario, is a clutz.

![Toad_sms.jpg](http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111210124740/mario/it/images/6/65/Toad_sms.jpg)

You can imagine what happens if he try\'s to make rockets! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

WARNING! This video is 15 MINUTES LONG! If you are looking for something short leave now!

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2FbjwnzHaGQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Definetely pretty 'cute.' I can hear Toad saying 'Uh-oh!' after each one XD
XD I integrated Toad into the video because my friend likes Toad. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Wow that space shuttle sure is tough.

Not a bad vid though..

Haha, I enjoyed the massive winged spaceplane at around 6 minutes. I made a few like that, most of them took off but ended up just spinning vertically.

It feels more fun to create obscene and impractical spaceplanes that barely stay in the air than perfect ones, at the moment. =P
Funny video but 9:52 hurted my eyes!

Why some REAL people don\'t fly rockets:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7Ty0SvrQSu4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> Haha, I enjoyed the massive winged spaceplane at around 6 minutes. I made a few like that, most of them took off but ended up just spinning vertically.
> 
> It feels more fun to create obscene and impractical spaceplanes that barely stay in the air than perfect ones, at the moment. =P

I was determined to get it working. Never did. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
